# wholeSymbol

**Instance Property**

An effect that makes all layers appear simultaneously.

## Declaration

```swift
var wholeSymbol: AppearSymbolEffect { get }
```

## Determining effect scope

- **byLayer**: An effect that makes each layer appear separately.
